title: Organized labors support for Democrats - cause

content.question: Which of the following was most significant in influencing organized labor to support the Democratic Party?

choices.label: Herbert Hoover’s signing of the Hawley-Smoot Tariff Act
Harry Truman’s use of the Taft-Hartley Act
The passage of the National Labor Relations Act (Wagner Act)
Woodrow Wilson’s appointment of Samuel Gompers to the War Production Board
The establishment of welfare capitalism in the 1920s

content.answer: The passage of the National Labor Relations Act (Wagner Act)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
